description: figure of a man whose body runs diagonally across the image; hands and arms are outstretched above his head in the upper left corner with feet in the lower right corner; face has large expressive eyes and mouth is partially open
inscription: LRC in plate: 1918 | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: [illegible] E.123-II
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18. | LL in pencil, below image: Aufschrei
title: Outcry
